Title: Windows App SDK 1.2 Lets Devs Create Third-Party Windows 11 Widgets -- Visual Studio Magazine
Description: Prior, Windows 11 widgets, those little boxes of text/graphics content that provide users with information generated by installed apps, such as news, weather, traffic, texts and so on, were off limits to Windows developers.

Title: Stop using trivial Guard Clauses! Try this instead
Description: Guard clauses sound like a great idea. However, how they are used in a trivial fashion provides little value and pollutes your domain code.

Title: GitHub - Alois-xx/SerializerTests: .NET Serializer testing framework
Description: .NET Serializer testing framework. Contribute to Alois-xx/SerializerTests development by creating an account on GitHub.
